scripts.start: npm run prepare:development && npm run serve
scripts.build: npm run prepare:production && npm run webpack
scripts.deploy: npm run build && tar cz -f build.tar.gz public/dist secure/dist && node scripts/github_upload_release_asset.js
scripts.prepare:development: npm run prepare:development:public & npm run prepare:development:secure
scripts.prepare:production: npm run prepare:production:public & npm run prepare:production:secure
scripts.serve: npm run serve:public & npm run serve:secure
scripts.webpack: npm run webpack:public & npm run webpack:secure
